entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -2.2°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this afternoon then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this afternoon. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 except minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 this evening. Low minus 6 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
